title: peer shouldn't hibernate if it has pending reads
body:
## Bug Report

### What version of TiKV are you using?
master.

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
doesn't matter.

### Steps to reproduce

### What did you expect?
All read requests shouldn't be blocked in raftstore forever.

### What did happened?
With the bug some read requests can be blocked in raftstore forever.
